name: Aha 2.0
tagline: AI employee that runs influencer marketing from start to end
description: Built for AI companies. Aha handles matching, outreach, negotiation, contracts, content review, follow-ups, and performance tracking. All you do is review and approve, just like a boss. Shaped by real campaigns with 300+ global brands, Aha 2.0 delivers a safer, more reliable way to work with influencers.

name: Mistral 3
tagline: A family of frontier open-source multimodal models
description: Mistral 3 includes three state-of-the-art small, dense models (14B, 8B, and 3B) and Mistral Large 3 â€“ our most capable model to date â€“ a sparse mixture-of-experts trained with 41B active and 675B total parameters. All models are released under the Apache 2.0 license. The Ministral models represent the best performance-to-cost ratio in their category. At the same time, Mistral Large 3 joins the ranks of frontier instruction-fine-tuned open-source models.

name: TrueFoundry AI Gateway
tagline: Connect, observe & control LLMs, MCPs, Guardrails & Prompts
description: TrueFoundryâ€™s AI Gateway is the production-ready, control plane to experiment with, monitor and govern your agents. Experiment with connecting all agent components together (Models, MCP, Guardrails, Prompts & Agents) in the playground. Maintain complete visibility over responses with traces and health metrics. Govern by setting up rules/limits on request volumes, cost, response content (Guardrails) and more. Being used in production for 1000s of agents by multiple F100 companies!

name: Fellow 5.0
tagline: Botless AI meeting notes with MCP and Zapier workflows
description: Fellow 5.0 gives you the flexibility, privacy, and control over how you capture and leverage your meetings. It offers the flexibility of bot and botless recording, the control of custom AI recaps, and the connected intelligence of the MCP Server, all under the same secure and compliant framework.

name: beLow
tagline: Inline insights with C/C++ that shows CPU, memory, energy
description: beLow automatically analyzes your C and C++ embedded code to identify performance bottlenecks and generate optimized code tailored to your target hardware. Slash execution time, reduce energy consumption, and accelerate time to market. Designed for developers building in automotive, aerospace, robotics, and other performance-critical systems, beLow simplifies the complex work of embedded code optimization so teams can focus on innovation, not fine-tuning.

name: Cumbuca
tagline: Develop your own payments infra in Brazil using our license
description: In Brazil, a payments license gives you full autonomy but takes years, millions in $$$, and heavy compliance. Existing providers get you live fast but restricts independence and operational control. Cumbuca merges both: you get the same development flexibility with direct access to Open Finance and Pix, with full operational control, reduced risk and flexible price. Build on official APIs, own your infra and data, customize every layer, and if you get your license, just plug your own certificate

name: Nerve
tagline: AI Chief of Staff that does your actual work
description: Nerve connects to the apps your team already uses, searches through your internal content, and automates your most common workflows. It handles everything from writing docs, to updating your CRM, creating tickets in JIRA, and responding to emails. Even more, it proactively surfaces your most important to-dos and team updates. Nerve is enterprise ready, with SOC 2 compliance, SAML/SSO support, and never trains on your data.

name: Transformers v5
tagline: The backbone of modern AI, re-engineered
description: The biggest update in 5 years. v5 brings a modular design, first-class quantization, and a new OpenAI-compatible serving API. Optimized for PyTorch and fully interoperable with the modern AI stack (vLLM, llama.cpp, GGUF).

name: Gleam
tagline: AI-powered design reviews from 10 expert panelists
description: Gleam gives your design a structured review from 10 AI panelists, each with their own specialtyâ€”UX, visual design, accessibility, product strategy, and more. Upload a screenshot and get scores, directional insights, and a short list of high-impact fixes to guide your next iteration.

name: Nova Act by Amazon
tagline: An AI agent platform on AWS for building reliable agents
description: Amazon Nova is a new generation of foundation models with frontier intelligence and industry leading price performance. Generate text, code, and images with natural language prompts.

name: ScreenBreak
tagline: Stop mindless scrolling and earn app access through effort
description: ScreenBreak helps you cut off app addiction by adding effort at the exact moment you try to open a distracting app. Instead of simple blocking, it asks you to complete a quick challengeâ€”tap fast, shake your phone, or draw a circle. Win, and you get a short access window; fail, and the urge breaks. ScreenBreak also provides detailed hourly and weekly screen-time insights to help you understand and improve your habits.

name: GanttTool
tagline: Online project Gantt charts builder with instant exports
description: Are you looking for a simple and free tool for quickly creating professional Gantt charts? PlantUML can do itâ€”but only if you remember all the necessary declarations and syntax, which is not always convenient. That's why I created the Gantt Chart Tool. You plan. The tool converts everything you need. No learning syntax, no delays â€” just a clean result.

name: devlo
tagline: Build, edit and ship software in one place.
description: devlo helps founders and teams build, edit and ship software under one platform. Preview live changes, deploy with a click, convert tickets to PRs, get high-signal code reviews and see team + AI productivity at a glance. Chat in your browser or tag devlo directly in Github & Jira.

name: Arcade Creator Studio
tagline: Beautiful, on-brand product stories without the wait.
description: Where LLMs know the internet, Arcade knows what is unique to your product and your brand â€“ that includes how your products are shown, your tone of voice, and what your images feel like. The new Creator Studio lets marketing teams effortlessly generate videos, videos, and update demos, without waiting on overwhelmed designers or expensive agencies.

name: Moodify: Playlists That Fit!
tagline: Music that matches your moment
description: AI-powered music experience that understands your moment. Speak naturally, and Moodify analyzes your mood, energy, activity, and context to build the perfect playlist using Spotify and Apple Music.

name: Ask Bar: AI Answers on Every Page
tagline: AI that reads your page, sees it, and gives context answers.
description: Ask Bar is an AI assistant that reads your page, understands visuals, and delivers instant, context-aware answers. It works on articles, code, PDFs, product pages, and more. Get live web research without switching tabs, unlock insights from screenshots, and keep your workflow moving anywhere you browse.

name: dr.aft
tagline: Cursor for Screenwriters
description: dr.aft is Cursor for screenwriters. An AI-powered screenwriting editor that understands Fountain and never breaks your format. It generates suggestions inline, respects industry-standard ".fountain" structure, and keeps every page production-ready. Custom style steering, distraction-free writing, and full BYOK support included. The kind of tool Christopher Moltisanti wouldâ€™ve killed for.

name: pipeRead
tagline: Your personal AI librarian: never grumpy, always free.
description: pipeRead is the AI librarian you've always wanted: helpful, smart, and definitely not grumpy. Simply pick a persona and get instant, tailored book recommendations. Instead of just genre tags, we use specific "personas" to generate recommendations. No paywalls just great books. We are live and ready to help you find your next favorite book! ðŸŒŸ

name: Scroll
tagline: Better navigation for ChatGPT, Claude, + Gemini
description: Long AI conversations are hard to navigate. You end up scrolling endlessly, trying to find something you asked ten messages ago. Scroll adds a sidebar that shows every turn in your conversation. Click any item to jump between prompts and responses. It works on Claude, ChatGPT, and Gemini. Toggle it with Cmd+. Use arrows and Enter to navigate if you prefer. Switch between seeing all messages or just your prompts. It's straightforward, free, and open source. Hope it helps!

name: superfill.ai
tagline: Stop typing. Start autofilling with Superfill.AI.
description: An open-source AI extension that remembers your info and auto-fills forms intelligently. Store answers once, AI matches them contextually across job apps, dating sites, surveys. Free forever: Multi-AI provider support, smart rephrasing and tagging, AES-256 key encryption, local-first storage, CSV support, custom templates. Premium (soon): Cloud AI models, sync across browsers, agentic RAG. Core features OSS forever. Track progress here: https://github.com/superfill-ai/superfill.ai/#-progress

name: Aha 2.0
tagline: AI employee that runs influencer marketing from start to end
description: Built for AI companies. Aha handles matching, outreach, negotiation, contracts, content review, follow-ups, and performance tracking. All you do is review and approve, just like a boss.
